function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Virus quanta concentration increases with occupant density, leading to higher infection risk and more newly infected people.","Impact":"Higher occupant density increases infection risk and number of newly infected people.","Mitigation":"Reduce occupant density in the building.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, ventilation systems, occupancy monitoring systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, staff.","Owner":"Building managers, facility management, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Exponential relationship between quanta concentration and time, leading to higher virus particles with increased occupant density.","Impact":"Higher occupant density results in more virus particles, increasing infection risk.","Mitigation":"Implement stricter occupancy limits, enhance ventilation and air filtration systems.","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, air quality sensors, ventilation systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, staff.","Owner":"Building managers, facility management, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Risk of infection increases with greater exposure to others and higher occupant density in the building.","Impact":"Higher exposure to others and increased occupant density elevate the risk of infection.","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, reduce occupancy limits, improve ventilation.","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, social distancing sensors, ventilation systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, staff.","Owner":"Building managers, facility management, public health authorities."}]}
